name: Helen McCrory
description: Helen McCroryGeneral InformationDate of BirthAugust 17, 1968Place of BirthLondon, EnglandDate of DeathApril 16, 2021 (age 52)Place of DeathLondon, EnglandRoleAunt PollyHelen Elizabeth McCrory, OBE was an English actress, whose role in Peaky Blinders is that ofPolly Gray.

name: Paul Bullion
description: Paul Bullionis a British actor best known for his rolesBilly Kitchenin hit drama seriesPeaky Blindersfor the BBC and Kurt Sutter'sThe Bastard Executionerfor FX. He has appeared in live theatre productions for The National Theatre and Shakespeare's Globe.

name: Bríd Brennan
description: Bríd Brennanis a Northern Irish actress of film, stage and television, best known for her theatre work. She originated the role of Agnes in critically acclaimed performances of Brian Friel'sDancing at Lughnasafor which she won a Tony Award. She playsAudrey ChangrettainPeaky Blinders.

name: Frances Tomelty
description: Frances TomeltyGeneral InformationDate of BirthOctober 6, 1948Place of BirthBelfast, Northern Ireland, UKRoleBethany BoswellFrances Eleanor Tomeltyis a Northern Irish actress. She portraysBethany BoswellinPeaky Blinders. Her other credits includeBergerac,Boon,Ballykissangel,Bonekickers, Inspector Morse, Silent Witness, Midsomer Murders, The Waking DeadandLaw & Order: UK.

name: Sam Neill
description: Sam NeillGeneral InformationDate of BirthSeptember 14, 1947 (age 73)Place of BirthOmagh, Co. Tyrone, Northern IrelandRoleChester CampbellSam Neilwas born in Northern Ireland to an English mother and New Zealand-born father. His notable roles include Dr. Alan Grant in theJurassic Parkfilms, Dr. William Weir inEvent Horizonand Hec in Hunt for theWilderpeople.

name: Tom Vaughan-Lawlor
description: Tom Vaughan-LawlorGeneral InformationDate of BirthNovember 4, 1977Place of BirthDundrum, Dublin, IrelandRoleMalacki ByrneTom Vaughan-Lawloris an Irish actor. He is best known for his role as Nigel "Nidge" Delaney in seriesLove/Hate. He playsMalacki ByrneinPeaky Blinders.

name: Paul Anderson
description: Paul AndersonGeneral InformationDate of Birth12 February 1978 (age 43)Place of BirthLondon, United KingdomRoleArthur ShelbyPaul Andersonis an English actor best known for his roles as Anderson inThe Revenant, Albert Donoghue inLegendand Colonel Sebastian Moran inSherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows. InPeaky Blinders, he portraysArthur Shelby.

name: Ian Peck
description: Ian Peckis a British actor who playsCurlyinPeaky Blinders. Other than this he is known for playing a Death Eater inHarry Potter and the Deathly Hallows, a guard inThe Wolfman, and Harry Dale inLady Chatterley's Lover.

name: Sam Claflin
description: Sam ClaflinDate of BirthJune 27, 1986Birth placeChiswick, London, EnglandRoleOswald MosleyAppeared in5Sam Claflinis an English actor. who is best known for portrayingFinnick OdairinThe Hunger Gamesfilm series. He also portrayedPhilip SwiftinPirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger TidesandWill TraynorinMe Before You.

name: Finn Cole
description: Finn ColeGeneral InformationDate of BirthNovember 9th, 1995 (age 25)Place of BirthLondon, EnglandRoleMichael GrayFinn Coleis an English actor who plays the role ofMichael Grayin Peaky Blinders. He is best known for his roles as Eric Birling in An Inspector Calls and as Joshua 'J' Cody in Animal Kingdom. He is a brother ofJoe Colewho portraysJohn Shelby.

name: Charlie Murphy
description: Charlotte "Charlie" Murphyis an Irish actress. She is best known for playing the lead role in Love/Hate and Happy Valley.
